pages.text: $(li)White Strawberries are a fruit that can be growed up from $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/neapolitan/strawberry_pips)Strawberry Pips$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can use White Strawberries to craft $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/neapolitan/strawberry_pips)Strawberry Pips$(/l), or $(l)White Strawberry Basket$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) too.
